game_description: After a journey at sea, you are shipwrecked on a tiny island. Using your wit, ingenuity and the advice of Carl the Crab, you must find a way to keep yourself from starving and survive. Craft tools, fend off creatures…Or you could just give up and die? Just enjoy the sunset while you can. Almost makes you forget that you're in a desperate struggle against your own mortality. Features: – Survive… Until You Die – Play standing In A Room-scale VR Experience – Craft tools, like a spear, from the island’s resources – Use your tools to catch fish, defend yourself… and do stuff, like, not die – Befriend (or not) the island’s wildlife including sharks and pesky seagulls – Foster a lifelong friendship with a crab. And, by lifelong, we mean a week at th
review_2: The game was way too buggy for me I didn't get much joy from playing, and the graphics are terrible compared to the original version, you would think that the graphics would be fine on the quest.
review_5: It's a great game but the graphics are a little bit off and the boxes glitch to where there's no flint. It's not like the original game but it's still good because it's on quest but it's really downgraded. Another thing is the lighting. It is very hard to start fires with the magnifying glass because you can't find the sun. Developers if you could possibly update the game soon I will absolutely love it and continue to enjoy this game
